title: Release Me! I Will Not! - Novel Updates
tags: Character Growth   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hiding True Abilities   Modern Day   Possessive Characters   Slow Romance   Transmigration
author: 歌詞
description:
This was Alisa’s second life, she was reborn in a new world. But then she finds out from God, her new body was destined to die for a person. This guy was the one she had a crush on.

But who was he?

He didn’t exist yet!

Alisa didn’t meet a boyfriend, she couldn’t even figure out any guy in her life. What if the next guy she met was the killer? It may be an accident or it may be intentional, but he could be the one to do it. She would never know! She didn’t even get the memories of her new life. Unfair!

Now she had to lead a lonely life. She didn’t want to die! It was better to be alone than to die.

… wait.

If the one to lead her to death was definitely a guy, why did she need one in her life? If she was destined to die straight then she could just bend! Who would live a lonely life? Not Alisa!

Alisa: Who needs a man to be happy?

Alisa: Not me!

Alisa: Hah! Take that!

God: …>
